vsParam:
Ah, [px] and you guys. I have something
to discuss with you, do you have a minute now?

Er, what is it?
Is it related to the "popular and powerful witch" thing?

Sort of. I have made many attempts by far,
but they didn't attract much attention...

So I am thinking about what my next challenge should be,
but I haven't come up with any good ideas.

Er... Singing, dancing, and wizardry...
Hmmmm... Okay! You take care of this, Anis!

Eh——!?
Let me think... How about consult someone popular?

Perhaps there's a secret, even if there's not,
you should be able to find inspiration from their experience.

Er, I see.
Someone popular... Popular...

Majorum Sensei... She's indeed a good choice.
After all, her name is known to all among witches and wizards.

Er, he is popular...
But I think he's more like being spoiled by everyone.

This is different from the popularity I pursue... Is there a
person... who is liked by people of all ages and both genders...

Let me think...
How about Majorum Sensei.

She should be very famous among witches and wizards, right?
Though it's hard to see her popularity in her usual look...

Er, indeed.
I guess Majorum Sensei is the person I am looking for.

Okay, then it's settled!
Let's go find Majorum Sensei!

Er, secret to my popularity?
Let me think... Secret, secret...

Uh—— None!
Noooo, how could there be no secret!

Hmm, but I didn't do anything special.
Besides, am I really popular...

I just stay steadfast in my study.
And strive to do everything right...

Stay steadfast in study...
And strive to do everything right...

That's right. Since you are troubled...
I am going to give you a special assignment!

Uh, why in such a hurry!?
Nevertheless, I can do it...

Hehe, go kill monsters with your wizardry.
Stay steadfast and learn wizardry first.

Ah, of course, don't force yourself, do you understand!?
Come back at once if you are in danger, okay? Promise me!
